merata idikerunu guwan palam athara padika wedikawak sahitha prathama guwan palama lesa ithihasayata ek wana weyangoda guwan palama idikirima sandaha waya kara athi mudala rupiyal miliyana 2000 ki.pradeshayata dirgha kalayaka patan adupaduwak wa pawathi pradeshiya sabha godanagilla da nawina pahasukamwalin samanwithawa idikaranu laduwa janadhipathithumage athin janatha ayithiyata pawara denu labina.nidagena sitina wipakshaya ekawara nagita rate dushanaya gana katha karana bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya kisiwak hanngimata awashyathawak nathi bawath waradak karana oonama ayakuta danduwam dena bawath awadharanaya kaleya.rate kisidu thanaka ada bim bomba nopipirunath apa ratata erehi bim bomba jiniwawala nam masa hayakata wathawak pupurana bawa penwa dun janadhipathiwaraya miya giya ayage ganan minum hadana aya eda minisun miya yana wita ganan haduwe nathi bawa prakasha kaleya.game daruwanta janapriya pasalakata athulu wimata athi ekama awasthawa wana paha wasare shishyathwa wibhagaya ahosi kirimata sudanam nathi bawath janadhipathiwaraya wadiduratath pawasiya.amathiwarun wana basil rajapaksha, filiks perera, wyapruthi amathi nirmala kothalawala, niyojya amathiwarun wana sarana gunawardhana, dulip wijesekara, lasantha alagiyawanna, parlimenthu manthriwarun wana sudarshani pranandupulle, kamala ranathunga, basnahira palath hitapu pradhana amathi prasanna ranathunga, hitapu palath amathi nimal lansa mahathma mahathmin athulu pirisak da me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..
